Package org.hiphap

Class EmployeeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hiphap.EmployeeManager
  • public class EmployeeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class uses the singleton pattern to allow easy access to the Employee data from any point within the system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addEmployee​(Employee employee)
      Adds an Employee object into the collection and saves the data to file.
      void deleteEmployee​(Employee employee)
      Removes an Employee object from the collection and saves the data to file.
      java.util.ArrayList<Employee> getEmployees()  
      static EmployeeManager getInstance()  
      void loadEmployeeData()
      Loads the contents from the data file into the internal ArrayList.
      void saveEmployeeData()
      Writes the contents of the internal ArrayList into the data file.
      java.util.ArrayList<Employee> searchByEmail​(java.lang.String email)
      Get a collection of Employee objects whose emails contain a String sequence.
      java.util.ArrayList<Employee> searchByName​(java.lang.String name)
      Get a collection of Employee objects whose names contain a String sequence.
      java.util.ArrayList<Employee> searchByPhone​(java.lang.String phoneNo)
